page.title: 15The General Environment
page.content: The land within our block is mainly used for farming. There is a mixture of arable and grazing land with some small wooded areas. There is no other industry of any significance in this area. The majority of the buildings in the village of{Middleton Tyas}are private dwelling houses and further building developments are restricted by planning controls. These are some of the factors which make it unlikely that there will be any major changes in the existing landscape during the foreseeable future. A{major change}in the local landscape which has taken place in the past 20 years has been the construction of the {Scotch Corner A1M/A66 Road {Interchange.} This and the {Scotch {Corner Hotel}are well known landmarks.
